author: Zelyonii_Zaktan
title: Another great selection of collectable minifigs!
review: Finally got them yesterday in the Czech Republic! There are lots of new and rare re-released parts. The quality is much more better in my opinion. Gladiator's bronze looks like real chrome, prinrings are great, price (at last in the Czech Republic) is still reasonable. But where are Brickset pages for every minifigure?

author: Cimi
title: Price Increase
review: The minifigures are as always a nice addition for my large Lego City (~ 400 sets). According to brickset the USD and GBP price for this series of minifigures is the same as before. Unfortunately, the Euro price is now 2,49 (instead 1,99 for series 1-4). Quite expensive, if you want to buy several minifigures (e.g. you need at least two boxers or guards). It looks like there is also an EURO-crisis in Legoland. Hopefully, the price will decrease for the next series.
